curam.util.ctm.bom

Class BusinessObjectHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • curam.util.ctm.bom.BusinessObjectHelper

  • public class BusinessObjectHelper
extends java.lang.Object
    This helper class constructs the XML using the data which is read from the entities of a business object. Also, it parses the XML and assigns the value of the XML node to corresponding entity dtls class.

    • Method Detail

      • constructEntityXML

        public org.w3c.dom.Element constructEntityXML(java.util.List<?> entityDtlsObjList,
                                              java.lang.String entityName,
                                              java.lang.String qualifiedClassName,
                                              org.w3c.dom.Document document)
                                       throws AppException,
                                              InformationalException
        Constructs XML from an entity record.
        Parameters:
        entityDtlsObjList - Contains list of generated standard details struct.
        entityName - Contains entity name.
        document - Contains document object representing the change set XML document.
        qualifiedClassName - Contains qualified class name of an entity.
        Returns:
        The XML element.
        Throws:
        AppException - Generic Exception Signature.
        InformationalException - Generic Exception Signature.

      • constructBusinessObjectXML

        public org.w3c.dom.Document constructBusinessObjectXML(org.w3c.dom.Document document,
                                                       BusinessObjectIdentifier boIdentifier,
                                                       java.util.List<org.w3c.dom.Element> dependencyHeader,
                                                       org.w3c.dom.Element auditHeader,
                                                       org.w3c.dom.Element body)
                                                throws AppException,
                                                       InformationalException
        This method constructs an xml document in the format as defined by the BOM infrastructure using the body passed in to populate the body of the xml and using the boIdentifier to set the key details within the xml document.
        Parameters:
        document - The document to construct the xml.
        boIdentifier - The identifier for the business object.
        dependencyHeader - The dependency header details of any dependencies for this BOM. This can be set to null if no dependencies exist.
        auditHeader - The audit header details for this BOM. This can be set to null if no details exist.
        body - This contains the body of the xml which contains details of all entities for this BOM.
        Returns:
        The business object details in xml format.
        Throws:
        AppException - General exception.
        InformationalException - General Informational exception.

      • processAttribute

        protected java.lang.Object processAttribute(java.lang.reflect.Field attribute,
                                            java.lang.Object element)
                                     throws AppException
        This method takes in an entity attribute and determines the type of attribute in order to process the attribute correctly. For date and date time, they should be converted to long.
        Parameters:
        attribute - The attribute.
        element - Contains attribute details.
        Returns:
        The value of the attribute.
        Throws:
        AppException - Generic Exception.

      • upsertDocument

        public void upsertDocument(org.w3c.dom.Document document,
                           java.lang.Object obj)
                    throws AppException,
                           InformationalException
        Iterates an XML document and assigns the value of the nodes to corresponding entity dtls field, these entities are related to a business object.
        Parameters:
        document - Contains document object.
        obj - Contains object of a calling business object implementation class.
        Throws:
        AppException - Generic Exception Signature.
        InformationalException - Generic Exception Signature.

      • updateSharedDataMap

        protected void updateSharedDataMap(int currentEntityIndex,
                                   int noOfEntities,
                                   java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> sharedDataMap)
        Updates the shared data map with the following variables.
        • Whether the entity getting processed is the first entity in the business object document
        • Whether the entity getting processed is the last entity in the business object document
        Parameters:
        currentEntityIndex - The index of the current entity that is getting processed.
        noOfEntities - The total number of entities in the business object document.
        sharedDataMap - The map that can be used to store and retrieved data that can be used across entity calls.

      • upsertObject

        protected void upsertObject(java.util.HashMap<?,?> columnMap,
                            java.lang.String className,
                            java.lang.String entityName,
                            java.lang.Object boObj)
                     throws AppException,
                            InformationalException
        Retrieve the name and value of an entity from the hash map. This hash map stores the name and value of column after parsing the XML document.
        Parameters:
        columnMap - Contains name and value of a column of an entity.
        entityName - Contains name of the entity.
        className - Contains the name of the class.
        boObj - Contains object of a calling business object implementation class.
        Throws:
        AppException - Generic Exception Signature.
        InformationalException - Generic Exception Signature.

                            java.lang.String className,

                     throws AppException,
                            InformationalException

        Parameters:
        columnMap - Contains name and value of a column of an entity.
        entityName - Contains name of the entity.
        className - Contains the name of the class.
        boObj - Contains object of a calling business object implementation class.
        sharedDataMap - The map that can be used to store and retrieved data that can be used across entity calls.

        AppException - Generic Exception Signature.

                               InformationalException

      • deriveEntityDtlsClassName

        public static java.lang.String deriveEntityDtlsClassName(java.lang.String entityClassName)
        Given the name of an entity, this method will find and return the entity's respective details class name.
        Parameters:
        entityClassName - The name of the entity class.
        Returns:
        The respective details class name that will be calculated from the name of the entity.

      • invokePrimaryKey

        protected void invokePrimaryKey(java.lang.Object key,
                                java.lang.Object value,
                                java.lang.String entityName,
                                java.lang.Object boObject)
                         throws AppException,
                                InformationalException
        Invokes the set primary key method of a business object implementation class based on object of that implementation class.
        Parameters:
        key - Contains name of the column of an entity.
        value - Contains value of column of an entity.
        entityName - The name of the entity.
        boObject - Contains instance of the business object implementation class.
        Throws:
        AppException - Generic Exception Signature.
        InformationalException - Generic Exception Signature.

      • setField

        public void setField(java.lang.reflect.Field field,
                     java.lang.Object reflectionObj,
                     java.lang.Object value)
              throws AppException,
                     java.lang.IllegalAccessException
        Set the each fields of an entity dtls struct from the transported XML document. This entity dtls class is part of a business object .
        Parameters:
        field - Contains name of the entity.
        reflectionObj - Contains object of entity dtls struct.
        value - Contains value of column of an entity
        Throws:
        AppException - Generic Exception Signature.
        java.lang.IllegalAccessException - Thrown to indicate that the currently executing method does not have access to the definition of the specified field.

      • throwUnhandledServerError

        public static void throwUnhandledServerError(java.lang.reflect.InvocationTargetException e,
                                             java.lang.Object boObject)
                                      throws AppException,
                                             InformationalException
        Throws the not handled server error to the caller which may happen with the usage of Java reflection APIs.
        Parameters:
        e - The exception object.
        boObject - The object representing the BOM instance.
        Throws:
        InformationalException - Generic Exception Signature.
        AppException - Generic Exception Signature.
